results.title: Diagnosis of adenomatous primary aldosteronism in a patient with severe hypertension.
results.text_hl: She was immediately commenced on @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ added 2 weeks later.

citations.NLM: Freel EM, Connell JM. Diagnosis of adenomatous primary aldosteronism in a patient with severe hypertension. Nat Clin Pract Endocrinol Metab. 2005 Dec;1(2):111-5; quiz following 115. PMID: 16929379
citations.BibTeX: @article{16929379, title={Diagnosis of adenomatous primary aldosteronism in a patient with severe hypertension.}, author={Freel EM and Connell JM}, journal={Nat Clin Pract Endocrinol Metab}, volume={1}, number={2}, pages={111-5; quiz following 115}}

results.title: Effects of selective and nonselective beta-agonists on plasma potassium and norepinephrine.
results.text_hl: For a given increase in heart rate and cardiac contractility, as measured by the heart rate-corrected duration of total @DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@electromechanical systole@@@, which are mainly beta 1-responses, the effects on @CHEMICAL_Potassium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011188 @@@potassium@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Norepinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009638 @@@norepinephrine@@@ were in the order: @CHEMICAL_Albuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000420 @@@salbutamol@@@ greater than @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@isoproterenol@@@ greater than @CHEMICAL_Prenalterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011294 @@@prenalterol@@@. beta-Blockade with @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (nonselective), 80 mg four times a day, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (beta 1-selective), 100 mg once a day, antagonized the @<m>DISEASE_Hypokalemic_Periodic_Paralysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020514 @@@hypokalemic@@@ effect of @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@isoproterenol@@@ as well as the rise in @CHEMICAL_Norepinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009638 @@@norepinephrine@@@, but when @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@isoproterenol@@@ was infused in doses high enough to overcome the blockade of the heart rate response, the effects on @CHEMICAL_Norepinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009638 @@@norepinephrine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Potassium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011188 @@@potassium@@@ were abolished by @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ and not by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Vincent HH, Boomsma F, Man in't Veld AJ, Derkx FH, Wenting GJ, Schalekamp MA. Effects of selective and nonselective beta-agonists on plasma potassium and norepinephrine. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1984 Jan-Feb;6(1):107-14. PMID: 6199591
citations.BibTeX: @article{6199591, title={Effects of selective and nonselective beta-agonists on plasma potassium and norepinephrine.}, author={Vincent HH and Boomsma F and Man in't Veld AJ and Derkx FH and Wenting GJ and Schalekamp MA}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={6}, number={1}, pages={107-14}}
